column1: Break down complex tasks into smaller manageable steps!
Create a study schedule and stick to it consistently!
Find a study method that works best for your learning style!
Take regular breaks to avoid burnout and maintain focus!
Prioritize your tasks based on importance and urgency!
Engage in active recall by testing yourself on the material!
Eliminate distractions during your study sessions!
Collaborate with peers to discuss ideas and concepts!
Summarize key points in your own words for better retention!
Reward yourself for achieving study goals and milestones!
